price: Ṣé wọn sọ àsọọ́lẹ̀ nípa rẹ̀ láààrin ara wọn ni? Rárá o! Ìjọ olùtayọ-ẹnu-ààlà ni wọ́n ni.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
